Component

component

escs.Component(name, init);

ParameterTypeDescription
nameString or Numberunique name of the Structure
initFunctionfunction to run to initialize the component when added to an Entity. The function should return an object, which will be the Entitity's value of this Component

Methods

  • setOnChange

Component > init


optiondescription
...parametersparameters to pass to the Component creation





Methods

setOnChange

sets the funtion to run when the value of this component type is changed

escs.Component.setOnChange();
